name: Generic Space Shooter (itch) (MattBolere)
description:
This is my first game, a simple shmup with 3 levels and a boss at the end.
It was created in Unity for the course Complete C# Unity Developer 2D on Udemy.

CONTROLS:
Move - WASD / arrow keys
Shoot - space / L mouse 
Pause - P

CREDITS

MUSIC

https://opengameart.org/content/railjet-long-seamless-loop
http://www.nosoapradio.us

SPRITES

https://www.kenney.nl/

https://opengameart.org/content/shmup-ships
